{ "html": { "value": "

About Service Portal

Service Portal is a ServiceNow feature that provides an alternate interface to manage content and access the platform through configurable pages and widgets, that are built using industry standard technologies.

The purpose of this Service Portal is to enhance the ServiceNow experience for State Street IT users by consolidating information and providing a streamlined interface to access data to support our ITSM procedures and governance.

", "displayValue": "

About Service Portal

Service Portal is a ServiceNow feature that provides an alternate interface to manage content and access the platform through configurable pages and widgets, that are built using industry standard technologies.

The purpose of this Service Portal is to enhance the ServiceNow experience for State Street IT users by consolidating information and providing a streamlined interface to access data to support our ITSM procedures and governance.
